column4: Hi I have a question regarding touchpad, Option "SHMConfig" "on", is required by some tool to modify the touchpad settings but the xorg.conf doesn't look like its used how it used to be and im confused. My goal is to stop phantum clicking while I am typing, so reducing the sensitivity of the click value.
thanks, im off to reboot etc.
that's my touchpad sorted, thanks a lot!
